=!SportsDevil=
||<img align="center" width=150 height=150 src="http://s1.directupload.net/images/110424/he54f4fc.png">||!SportsDevil is a video addon for live sports and highlights, blogs and TV.<br>It's based on !VideoDevil, so big thanks to the developers.<br>!SportsDevil scrapes and resolves embedded streams from websites so that they can be played with xbmc.<br>It dynamically parses cfg files that contain regular expressions used for scraping.<br>Please try it out and give me some feedback.||

==Requirements==
Copy newest librtmp.dll to xbmc/system/players/dvdplayer (See [http://wiki.xbmc.org/index.php?title=Librtmp this page] for further information / compiled versions for your OS)

External players needed for:
  <ul>
  <li> Sopcast (<a href="http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?t=108544">Howto use !SopCast as external player</a>)</li>
  <li> !StreamTorrent (<a href="http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?t=108539">Howto use !StreamTorrent as external player</a>)</li>
  </ul>
Other addons needed for:
  <ul>
  <li> Veetle (needs Veetle addon)</li>
  <li> !YouTube (needs !YouTube addon)</li>
  <li> Freedocast (needs Freedocast addon)</li>
  </ul>
